name: Friendly Neighborhood Raccoon
description:
Welcome to the Enchanted Forest!

Play as a raccoon sent on a mission to explore and interact with the world  around him.

On your Quest you will encounter friends and foes each with a unique purpose.

Help your forest friends to the best of your ability by doing Quests, Challenges, And Battles.

In Early Stages :)

Goal-

Talk to all npc characters to complete their goals or missions. Complete every character and all objectives in order to beat the game

Tips-

Only one quest can be active at a time

Some characters need to be unlocked

For reading all this there is a secret character that gives you a shield to use. The ? text that will appear on your screen is from the owl character who is on the rock in the second area. use the mega jump ability to get up there and talk to him. then when you talk to the walrus you can activate the shield to protect yourself from the rocks
